Package org.opencart.utilities

package org.opencart.utilities
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DataProviderUtilities
    DataProviderUtilities contains method that supplies data to the test method.
    DynamicLocatorUtility
    DynamicLocatorUtility class contains methods that return String value of locators.
    ExcelUtilities
    ExcelUtilities class fetches the data from excel sheet.
    PropertyUtilities
    PropertyUtilities class fetches the data from properties file.
    ScreenshotUtils
    ScreenshotUtils class is responsible for capturing the screenshot and storing in screenshots folder in test reports.
